alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 02 at 9:54PM PDT until November 03 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Airway Heights, Othello, Ephrata, Creston, La Crosse, Wilbur, Rosalia, Downtown Spokane, Tekoa, Coulee City, Cheney, Odessa, Grand Coulee, Quincy, Ritzville, Oakesdale, Fairfield, Harrington, Davenport, Colfax, and Moses Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Around the Spokane area, most of the dense fog will be found at the higher elevations, west of the city including the West Plains and Airway Heights. Over the Palouse, most of the fog will be found from Colfax northward.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse
